text: Over the past couple of days I binged season 1 of The Chair on Netflix. I liked it. It's quick, only about three hours. It's a Sorkin-like show, like The West Wing or The Newsroom, fast dialog. Fun and really pulls on the heartstrings. There's cute smart little girl, and a timely plot of a second-tier Ivy League school that reminded me that campuses can be interesting places to hang out. I gave it a 4 of 5 on BingeWorthy.
